long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of straining your eyes during late-night browsing sessions or simply craving a sleek, modern look for your favorite websites? Our Dark Mode Chrome extension is the answer you've been looking for.

Key Features:

Seamless Dark Mode: Instantly switch websites to a dark, eye-friendly theme with a single click. No more blinding white backgrounds.

Customization: Fine-tune your browsing experience with adjustable darkness levels. Choose the perfect balance between readability and elegance.

Save Power: Dark Mode not only reduces eye strain but can also help save battery life on your laptop or mobile device.

Global Activation: Enable dark mode for all websites by default or individually select which sites you want it activated on.

User-Friendly: Intuitive and easy-to-use interface, making it accessible for everyone.

Automatic Synchronization: Our extension remembers your preferences, so you don't have to reset it every time you open your browser.

Frequently Updated: We're committed to providing a top-notch experience. Expect regular updates and improvements.
